summary:
Senior commercial expert & entrepreneur in area-, mobility- and International Tourism & leisure development|
Dutch Delta Cruise Port|Dutch Mountains Initiative|HSMAI

projects.title: Realization pilot chain mobility and safeguarding multi-year approach
projects.description: As a follow-up to the chain mobility feasibility study, we will work in the coming years on connecting the river cruise sector, quay and destination development and smart passenger transport over water in the Drechtsteden and surrounding regions.

contributors.headline: Concept ontwikkelaar en stedenbouwkundige bij BLOC bv

projects.title: Feasibility study ferry between Drimmelen, Altena, Geertruidenberg and National Park De Biesbosch (Hofmansplaat)
projects.description: Feasibility study, in collaboration with Staatsbosbeheer, into a "triangle" ferry between (and on behalf of) the municipalities of Drimmelen, Altena, and Geertruidenberg

projects.title: Financing strategy Urban development vision/zoning plan Entrance Area Kinderdijk/Elshout
projects.description: On behalf of the Municipality of Molenlanden, BLOC works together with partners such as the UNESCO World Heritage Kinderdijk, the Province of South Holland, The Water Authority Rivierenland and the national government on the realization of the Urban Development Vision / Zoning Plan Entrance Zone Kinderdijk/Elshout

contributors.headline: Concept ontwikkelaar en stedenbouwkundige bij BLOC bv

projects.title: Feasibility study improving the mobility value chain in the Drechtsteden
projects.description: In response to the BLOC report ‘Status update river cruise sector Drechtseden/Waterdriehoek’ (June 2021), we work on one of the recommendations in this report, namely a feasibility study to improve the mobility value chain within the region. In doing this, we explicitly make the link between the most important tourist destinations, alternative docking locations for the river cruise sector and passenger transport services across water.

contributors.headline: Concept ontwikkelaar en stedenbouwkundige bij BLOC bv

projects.title: Strategy development rivercruise sector "Waterpoort"
projects.description: BLOC is advising the maritime region of "Waterpoort" (including the cities of Bergen op Zoom, Halderberg, Moerdijk/Willemstad, Tholen and Steenbergen on the status and opportunities for the river cruise sector in the region. The report provides insight into the sector and concrete development opportunities for the region

projects.title: Feasibility study ferry between Drimmelen and National Park De Biesbosch (Hofmansplaat)
projects.description: Bloc is working on behalf of the municipality of Drimmelen and State Forestry Lelystad on a feasibility study for a permanent ferry connection between Drimmelen and National Park de Biesbosch (Hofmansplaat).

contributors.headline: Concept ontwikkelaar en stedenbouwkundige bij BLOC bv

projects.title: Arriva, more than a public transport operator
projects.description: How can Arriva’s public transport services integrate more effectively with urban planning developments in the Netherlands? BLOC is advising Arriva how to strategise and implement this in theire operation

contributors.headline: Partner + urbanist @ BLOC | Clever, clean and creative cities

projects.title: Dutch Mountains (Brainport Eindhoven)
projects.description: In Brainport Eindhoven, BLOC is developing an ultra-dynamic and circular building that will serve as the public face for the region. In collaboration with Studio Marco Vermeulen, Urban XChange, AAFM/Asito, Dell Technologies, Honeywell and SPIE.

contributors.headline: Founder Urban Xchange, co-founder The Dutch Mountains Eindhoven
architect and urban designer at Studio Marco Vermeulen (SMV)

projects.title: PROJECTLEIDER TOERISTISCH-RECREATIEF INVESTERINGSPROGRAMMA OOSTVOORNSE MEER
projects.description: Opstellen van een investeringsprogramma voor het Oostvoornse Meer,  i.s.m. Berkers Advies en Vista, voortbouwend op een eerder door ons opgestelde visie., i.o.v. Gemeente Westvoorne. Feb 2015-heden

contributors.headline: Eigenaar Berkers Advies - Adviseur, project-, proces- en programmamanager. Recreatie + Toerisme, Natuur + Landschap, Ruimte, Erfgoed, Energietransitie

projects.title: Begeleiding strategische sessie regiomarketing Bollenstreek
projects.description: Marketingorganisaties, gemeenten en bedrijfsleven in de Bollenstreek werken samen een gezamenlijke en gedragen aanpak uit voor de product- en marktontwikkeling. Wij begeleidden een strategische sessie en adviseerden over thematische en strategische samenwerking.

contributors.headline: Sustainability Professional | Projectmanager Nova Innova | Projectmanager gemeente Den Haag

projects.title: TOERISTISCH-RECREATIEVE VISIE OOSTVOORNSE MEER
projects.description: Opstellen van een visie en een bijbehorend uitvoeringsprogramma waarmee het Oostvoornse Meer een stevige impuls wordt gegeven op het gebied van recreatie en toerisme. I.s.m. Berkers Advies en Vista,  i.o.v. Gemeente Westvoorne. Oktober 2014- februari 2015

contributors.headline: Eigenaar Berkers Advies - Adviseur, project-, proces- en programmamanager. Recreatie + Toerisme, Natuur + Landschap, Ruimte, Erfgoed, Energietransitie

projects.title: Statusupdate rivercruise sector Drechtsteden (a.o Dordrecht and Kinderdijk)
projects.description: BLOC advised the maritime region of de "Drechtsteden (Dordrecht and surrounding area including the Unesco Wold Heritage Kinderdijk) on the status and opportunities for the river cruise sector in the region. The report provides insight into the sector and concrete development opportunities for the region

contributors.headline: Concept ontwikkelaar en stedenbouwkundige bij BLOC bv

projects.title: Redevelopment Heineken Zoeterwoude
projects.description: BLOC is leading the renewal of the Heineken office building in Zoeterwoude into a green, healthy and inspiring environment that meets modern standards of comfort and sustainability.

contributors.headline: Partner + urbanist @ BLOC | Clever, clean and creative cities

projects.title: A new real estate strategy for KPMG
projects.description: KPMG has an extensive real estate portfolio with regional offices, sub-offices, and head offices. KPMG wanted to carry out a thorough overhaul of this portfolio to find out how to use their spaces more effectively. The COVID-19 pandemic reinforced this need, considering the benefits we experienced from hybrid working and working from home. This raised the question of what the future of work would look like.

contributors.headline: Real Estate Business Leadership | Investor Relations & Transactions | Real Estate Management | Consultancy & Education

projects.title: Area-development De Ginkel Ede
projects.description: Development of a vision and approach for the redevelopment of "De Ginkel", part of the National Park Hoge Veluwe in Ede, including a visitor center.

projects.title: Maximum Green Mobility
projects.description: Together with the Floriade Expo 2022 B.V. (april 2022- oktober 2022), BLOC has developed a strategy for an extremely sustainable, testable and measurable mobility concept that is an international showcase for Growing Green Cities.  Together with a number of natural partners (including governments and providers of public transport and smart mobility) this concept will be converted into concrete mobility solutions.

contributors.headline: Partner + urbanist @ BLOC | Clever, clean and creative cities

projects.title: Perspective Tourism 2030 Zuid-Holland
projects.description:
Drawing up "Perspective, Tourism 2030 Zuid-Holland"
Together with the Province of Zuid-Holland and many public and private stakeholders BLOC guides the province in drawing up this perspective. This perspective should serve as a starting point for the future provincial policy for the touristic and recreational sector.

projects.title: Floriade 2022
projects.description: The next Floriade, the decennial international Expo, will take place in Almere in 2022. The ambition is to build the greenest district imaginable. BLOC is responsible for the development strategy, co-operating with Northern Light, MVRDV the City of Almere, the Province of Flevoland and the Floriade Project Organisation.

contributors.headline: Sustainability Professional | Projectmanager Nova Innova | Projectmanager gemeente Den Haag

projects.title: Waternetwerk IJsselmeer
projects.description: BLOC is working with the Dutch Provinces Noord-Holland and Flevoland and the cities Amsterdam, Almere en Lelystad to set up a fast ferry waternetwork with connections along the IJsselmeer. In the coming months we will work on the feasibility of a business case. The Waterbus nerwork in the Rotterdam region (with UNESCO site Kinderdijk and oldest city of Holland, Dordrecht) and pilots to and within the Haringvliet serve as inspiration.

contributors.headline: Partner + urbanist @ BLOC | Clever, clean and creative cities

projects.title: Feasibility study of the Markerwadden ferry connection
projects.description: Bloc is working on behalf of the municipality of Lelystad and in collaboration with "Natuurmonumenten" on a feasibility study for a permanent fast ferry connection between Lelystad and the Markerwadden. This connection is necessary for the further development of the Markerwadden nature reserve

publications.name: Investeringsbereidheid en raakvlak als katalysator voor economische vitaliteit

authors.headline: Beleidsadviseur veilig, duurzaam en gezond wonen

publications.name: Gebiedscoalitie Waterdriehoek: slim samenwerken, slim investeren

profile_positions.title: Managing Partner/Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
The Vacalians Group (changed its brandname in 2018 to Vacanceselect) is one of the leading companies in the campsite industry created by the merge and acquisition of several major players as Village Center Loisir, Vacances directes, Canvas and Vacanceselect. Operating under several brands as: Tohapi, Canvas and Vacanceselect.
The Vacalians Group represents:
- More than 700 destinations in Europe
- More than 40 owned campsites
- More than 20.000 accommodations
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director North European Markets

profile_positions.company: NBTC Netherlands Board of Tourism & Conventions
profile_positions.description: In 2012 the Netherlands Board of Tourism and Conventions (NBTC) started with it's (inter)national campaign, "Holland, naturally. A strategy to combine the stenght of the tourism and the nature sector within The Netherlands. The TLC Group was asked to work out the model of collaboration between both sectors as well as the distribution and marketing strategy.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanagement

profile_positions.description: Several senior management consultancy projects with focus on marketing and sales, citymarketing and interimmanagement for companies as: Sanoma Publishers/Ilsemedia, Dutch National Tourist Offices (VVV Nederland), DNA,TSI Solutions and more.
profile_positions.title: Director/owner

profile_positions.description:
Visitor & Convention Bureau The Hague
Den Haag Marketing & Events is the overall citymarketing organization of The Hague and it's two beachresorts Scheveningen and Kijkduin
profile_positions.title: Director
